about: I'm a Software Developer with 5 years of experience in the hosting industry. I've had a passion for computers and games since childhood and that passion evolved into software development. I've worked on various web projects and I'm eager to learn more. I have a passion for creating user-friendly interfaces and software that consumers will love. I am dedicated to examining open-source projects and continuously improving myself by staying up-to-date with emerging technologies. I take pleasure in contributing to team-oriented projects by fulfilling my tasks thoroughly and making valuable contributions with my problem-solving skills.

projects.name: BackLogger50

projects.name: Ecbus.net

projects.name: Personal & Professional Websites
projects.description: I made some website projects for personal and business use. I made myself a personal website which uses HTML CSS and Javascript. In the business side I made PHP and Jquery based CMS websites for avcimakina.com.tr and eayk.org.

projects.description: This is an hyper casual mobile game which is made by Unity 3D and C#. This project is made for understanding Unity and Android market work.

experience.description: In this role, I am responsible for managing both online and offline systems by performing updates, installations, and providing support as needed. My responsibilities include automating processes using Bash scripting and Python. Additionally, I leverage my expertise in Linux, PHP-FPM, and MySQL during system updates and installations to ensure smooth and efficient operations.

In this position my main role is Providing technical support to customers by answering support tickets and phone calls and Fixing the errors checking in Linux, centOS, Windows Server , Plesk , cPanel , DirectAdmin, IceWarp , vmware , hyper-V , PHP , ASP .NET , Wordpress and similar systems. Beside my main role I developed some apps and tools like Windows service App in C# .net and PHP to make our job easier. I improved my communication, problem-solving and Server Management skills in this role .
